data.why:
I working on Apache::JSP (temporary name). The module provides a
    parser to JSP files (initially, JSP 1.X, but later JSP 2.X). The
    parser breaks JSP files into JSP tokens (scriplets, actions,
    declaration, EL).

    The parser can be used to process JSP projects in various ways.
    common usages: - Convertion of JSP application into other
    application frameworks (Mason, axkit, ...) - Using JSP pages as the
    viewer component of an MVC application - pre-processing of JSP files
    (translating tag libs, etc).
